article.title: Zeta Associates to Upgrade Guardian Eagle X-Midas Systems
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Â Zeta Associates Inc., Fairfax, Va., was awarded a cost-plus-fixed-fee with a maximum value of $28,500,000 for the upgrade and production of Guardian Eagle X-Midas V3 systems and related services. The Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Md., is the contracting activity.
